name: fidbak
description: Fidbak is a lightweight, framework‑free user feedback widget (FAB + modal) with an edge API and a minimal dashboard. It lets you collect page‑aware feedback from any website and immediately fan it out to Slack or your own webhooks.
author: Ekene Eze

scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,dashboard,widget,docs,cdn -c green,blue,magenta,cyan,yellow "pnpm -C apps/api dev" "pnpm -C apps/dashboard dev" "pnpm -C packages/widget dev" "pnpm -C examples/docs-site dev" "pnpm -C examples/cdn-umd dev"
scripts.release: echo 'Release pipeline will run via CI (version, changelog, publish, deploy)'
